1.text: Pinch the waist of the dress to determine how much to take in.

2.text: Turn the dress inside out and insert pins along the seamline.
2.vid: /2/26/Take in a Dress at the Waist Step 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Try on the dress and adjust the pins if needed.
3.vid: /0/0d/Take in a Dress at the Waist Step 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Remove the dress and mark each side seam from the armhole to the waist.
4.vid: /2/23/Take in a Dress at the Waist Step 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Sew a straight stitch along the seam lines you marked.
5.vid: /7/70/Take in a Dress at the Waist Step 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Turn the dress right side out and try it on.
6.vid: /9/90/Take in a Dress at the Waist Step 6.360p.mp4

7.text: Try on an inside-out dress and wrap a narrow belt around the waist.
7.vid: /b/bd/Take in a Dress at the Waist Step 7.360p.mp4

8.text: Mark around the waistline with fabric chalk.
8.vid: /d/d0/Take in a Dress at the Waist Step 8.360p.mp4

9.text: Lay the dress on a table and measure the waistline circumference.
9.vid: /f/ff/Take in a Dress at the Waist Step 9.360p.mp4

10.text: Cut a strip of fabric that's 1 inch (2.5 cm) longer than the circumference.

11.text: Fold the strip lengthwise and sew 1⁄4 inch (0.64 cm) along the edge.
11.vid: /2/2a/Take in a Dress at the Waist Step 11.360p.mp4

12.text: Hook a safety pin to 1 end of the casing and pull the casing right side out.
12.vid: /e/e6/Take in a Dress at the Waist Step 12.360p.mp4

13.text: Pin the casing just below the waistline you marked on the dress.

14.text: Edge stitch the bottom and top of the casing to the waistline.
14.vid: /c/ca/Take in a Dress at the Waist Step 14.360p.mp4

15.text: Cut a piece of elastic 1 inch (2.5 cm) longer than the waistline.
15.vid: /f/fa/Take in a Dress at the Waist Step 15.360p.mp4

16.text: Secure a safety pin to the elastic and pull it through the casing.
16.vid: /e/e6/Take in a Dress at the Waist Step 16.360p.mp4

17.vid: /a/ae/Take in a Dress at the Waist Step 17.360p.mp4
